title: Witherbloom Acadmey, Bi-weekly Narrative poetry with Ink (Ep: 3)
post:
<b><center>Maurice </center> </b><br> <br>Can I debate
<br> My right to debate?
<br> Clean slate
<br> Full plate
<br> Stopped feeling great awhile ago.
<br> Do we have the right to ignorance? <br> Should we?
<br> <br> Should we be allowed the decreasing and decreasing deniability that we have
<br> While we still have it?
<br> Im tired of thoughts, I just want.. <br> silence. <br><br><br> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~<br><br> <b><u>(AU):</u><i> Thank you for reading this post, i really appreciate it (I’m so sorry I was late this week). New entries will continue to come Sundays and Wednesdays. If you missed my last one, you can always check out my scratch studio with  a full library of all past entries { https://scratch.mit.edu/studios/33694307/ } or you can just check out the scratch project for this entry, which has footnotes and explanations for this entry, as well as its relations to past and future episodes { https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/883603515/ }(which will be added tomorrow). And as always, thank you for your time. :pride::heart::trans:
